name: HUMANITARIAN INTERVENTION AND PIONEERING SUPPLIER
description: GMS-HIPS is an autonomous department of General Massive Systems directly attached to the Union department of justice and human rights. Specifically tailored for humanitarian intervention the HIPS line might lack some firepower compared to the offering of other manufacturers but offers unique systems others would have deemed too cumbersome for installation on mechanised chassis as well as highly advanced systems, some even developed in Unions joined program with Harrisonâ€™s Think Tank.
